00026 struct rdp_sec
00027 {
00028         struct rdp_rdp * rdp;
00029         int rc4_key_len;
00030         SSL_RC4 rc4_decrypt_key;
00031         SSL_RC4 rc4_encrypt_key;
00032         uint32 server_public_key_len;
00033         uint8 sec_sign_key[16];
00034         uint8 sec_decrypt_key[16];
00035         uint8 sec_encrypt_key[16];
00036         uint8 sec_decrypt_update_key[16];
00037         uint8 sec_encrypt_update_key[16];
00038         uint8 sec_crypted_random[SEC_MAX_MODULUS_SIZE];
00039         uint16 server_rdp_version;
00040         /* These values must be available to reset state - Session Directory */
00041         int sec_encrypt_use_count;
00042         int sec_decrypt_use_count;
00043         struct rdp_mcs * mcs;
00044         struct rdp_licence * licence;
00045 };
00046 typedef struct rdp_sec rdpSec;
